FOUND IN: Semibreve (or whole note) - In terms of rhythm, a semibreve lasts for four crotchets, making its total value equivalent to a quarter-note's worth in a 4/4 time signature.
Aeon - an indefinite, seemingly endless period or moment.
Collard greens - Large leaf vegetables from the Brassica family similar to kale but thicker and more sturdy; commonly prepared by simmering with bacon, vinegar, and spices.
Franz Liszt - A prominent Hungarian-born piano virtuoso and composer, he greatly influenced Romantic-era music.
Chianti - A red wine produced in Tuscany, made primarily from Sangiovese grapes.
